__e: If I had to be Farnsworth, could we do it temporary? Yes.
The state attorney will cut a deal with you. You could be out in a couple of years.
But we've to make it look like an accident.
Because I think you've got a break coming to you.
The work will get done. I think it'll be all right about me.
I'm sure we can manage to give them another chance.

Listen... Listen. I said I love you.
